but if i use client.java and the var is in player.java id just do like this player.direction = 50; for example…[br][size=1]Posted at: April 29, 2006, 10:55:05 pm[/size][hr]i need help on this to work -.-

New info found…

i need help using this… lol =)

	//playerMD = misc.direction(absX, absY, skillX, skillY);
	if (playerMD != -1) {
		//playerMD >>= 1;
		updateRequired = true;
		dirUpdateRequired = true;

any1 got a idea how to use this?
